sys_ui_macro.description: This UI Macro (with the corresponding UI Formatter) will be able to show the latest version of the ACL Instructions in the ACL Analysis Task. Whenever there is an update to the ACL Instruction, there is no need to update any previously generated Tasks - the latest version of the instruction is always present on the form.
sys_ui_macro.name: acl_instructions
sys_ui_macro.xml:
const contentGr = new GlideRecord('content_block_static'); contentGr.addQuery('sys_id', '6e03cfdf978e3d103c2d3f56f053af9a'); contentGr.setLimit(1); contentGr.query(); let instructions = ''; if (contentGr.next()) { instructions = contentGr.static_content.toString(); }
$[instructions]
